page.title: 12FARM VISIT - WASHINGTON
page.content: Today we went to Havannah Farm with Mr.Wilkinson and Mrs.Brewster. When we got there we met the farmer Mr.Malpass.He took us into one of his barns so we could talk to him. We asked him lots of questions about the farm and what he did on the farm and if he enjoyed working there. He said he enjoyed working on the farm very much. After we had been talking to him about his work he took us outside to show us his cows. He shouted a few funny words and the cows came galloping towards us. This we found very amusing. After awhile the farmer went back to the farmhouse to get a few titti bottles to feed the calves. Tracy,my friend, took some photographs of the cows and the farmer and so did my teacher, Mr.Wilkinson.
